common_2090_staff_01:
Hello there! Would you like to enter the
Academy Ace Tournament?
common_2090_staff_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)]M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss [VAR TRNAME(0000)], a
Champion-ranked\r
Trainer,\r
right?
common_2090_staff_03:
OK, you’re all registered as a contestant. Please
head down to the battle court.
sub_012_announce_00:
Welcome, one and all, to another thrilling
Academy Ace Tournament!
sub_012_announce_01:
Let’s get right to it and kick off the first round!
Who will the fates pair up today?!
sub_012_announce_02:
Next up is the second round! I’m sure you’re
ready to hear the matchup, so let’s get to it!
sub_012_announce_03:
Finally, only four Trainers remain! Time for our
contestants to face their third matches, everyone!
sub_012_announce_04:
There’s one last match in this tournament, ladies
and gentlemen.\c
These two Trainers will be facing off to finally
determine who’s the strongest in the academy!
sub_012_announce_intro_01: the cook of legends, Arven from class 2-G!
sub_012_announce_intro_02:
the ex-star-ordinary hacker—it’s Penny from
class 1-D!
sub_012_announce_intro_03:
our very own battle studies teacher, the hot-
blooded Ms. Dendra!
sub_012_announce_intro_04:
our very own mathematics teacher—the savvy
statistician, Ms. Tyme!
sub_012_announce_intro_05:
our very own history teacher—the intrepid
explorer of antiquity, Ms. Raifort!
sub_012_announce_intro_06:
our very own medical expert—the angel of the
nurse’s office, Nurse Miriam!
sub_012_announce_intro_07:
our very own home economics teacher—the gruff
yet homey Mr. Saguaro!
sub_012_announce_intro_08:
our very own biology teacher! He’s a free and
breezy fella—it’s Mr. Jacq!
sub_012_announce_intro_09:
our very own languages teacher! He talks the talk
like no other—it’s Mr. Salvatore!
sub_012_announce_intro_10:
The strongest-ever student council president!
It’s Champion Nemona!
sub_012_announce_intro_11:
our very own academy director—it’s the man of
impeccable manners, Mr. Clavell!
sub_012_announce_intro_12:
our very own art teacher—the roaring dragon,
Mr. Hassel!
sub_012_announce_intro_13:
the chairwoman of the school board AND the
Top Champion herself—it’s Ms. Geeta!
sub_012_chara_01_01:
Argh! Why you, of all people? I’ve got one shot
at this... I can’t blow it![VAR 0114(0006)]
sub_012_chara_01_02:
Tch! Guess getting pitted up against my little
buddy was just my bad luck![VAR 0114(0006)]
sub_012_chara_02_01:
M-my Veevees and I won’t back down—even up
against you, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]![VAR 0114(0008)]
sub_012_chara_02_02:
Crazy strong, as always... But y’know what?
I’m proud of you.[VAR 0114(0008)]
sub_012_chara_03_01:
Prepare to taste defeat, new kid! You’re no
pushover, but neither am I![VAR 0114(0024)]
sub_012_chara_03_02:
Hate to say it, but you beat me! Best of luck in
your next battle![VAR 0114(0024)]
sub_012_chara_04_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Oh, my. Hello, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]. Let’s
make\r
this\r
a\r
nice,\r
friendly\r
battle,\r
shall we?[VAR 0114(0025)]
sub_012_chara_04_02:
Oh, if only I could have battled you in my prime.
Keep up the excellent work![VAR 0114(0025)]
sub_012_chara_05_01:
Hello, my little student. I look forward to
deciphering the secret to your skill.[VAR 0114(0027)]
sub_012_chara_05_02:
History is written by the victors. Cast aside the
vanquished and ascend your rightful throne.[VAR 0114(0027)]
sub_012_chara_06_01:
The “angel of the nurse’s office”? Seriously? Ugh.
Well, whatever. Let’s have a heavenly battle![VAR 0114(0028)]
sub_012_chara_06_02:
I’ll heal you up if you get injured, so don’t hold
back in your next battle either, OK?[VAR 0114(0028)]
sub_012_chara_07_01:
I am pleased to be facing you in battle. Now,
allow me to show you my skills.[VAR 0114(0029)]
sub_012_chara_07_02:
What can I say in the face of such strength?
I should have expected no less from a Champion.[VAR 0114(0029)]
sub_012_chara_08_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]It’s an honor to battle you,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)].\r
I think\r
I’ll\r
go\r
all\r
out\r
for\r
this one![VAR 0114(002A)]
sub_012_chara_08_02:
Yep! Nicely done! Keep up the winning streak
for me, won’t you?[VAR 0114(002A)]
sub_012_chara_09_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Bonjour, my dear [VAR TRNAME(0000)]!
I won’t\r
shy\r
from\r
this\r
battle!\r
Allez, on y va![VAR 0114(0026)]
sub_012_chara_09_02:
Oh no! Looks like this is the end of the line for
me! Adios, mata ne, and adieeeuuu![VAR 0114(0026)]
sub_012_chara_10_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Yesss! You and me, bringin’ it home for the finale,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]! I’m so psyched!\r
Time\r
for\r
us\r
Champions\r
to\r
let loose![VAR 0114(0004)]
sub_012_chara_10_02:
That battle was the best! Thanks—I mean it.
And hey, you went and won it all! Felicidades![VAR 0114(0004)]
sub_012_chara_11_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]So you are to be my opponent then, M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss
[VAR TRNAME(0000)].\r
I shall\r
meet\r
you\r
with\r
my\r
full strength.[VAR 0114(000A)]
sub_012_chara_11_02:
It is truly astonishing how much you have grown...
That was a splendid battle.\c
Congratulations on a most deserving victory.[VAR 0114(000A)]
sub_012_chara_12_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Well, now! [VAR TRNAME(0000)]! It seems
I,\r
Hassel,\r
bar\r
your\r
path\r
to\r
victory\r
once\r
more!\r
I look\r
forward\r
to\r
a\r
worthy battle.[VAR 0114(0012)]
sub_012_chara_12_02:
Co...CONGWADULATIONS! I’b...I’b zo habby
for you... BWUUUH huh huh hoi hoi![VAR 0114(0012)]
sub_012_chara_13_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]I decided to throw my hat in the ring once more.
Come now, Champion [VAR TRNAME(0000)]...\r
Show\r
me\r
the\r
fruits\r
of\r
your\r
training.[VAR 0114(0011)]
sub_012_chara_13_02:
The future of Paldea is secure with you, I see.
This was a fine victory. Congratulations.[VAR 0114(0011)]
sub_012_announce_07:
And the winner of this first-round battle is...
Champion [VAR TRNAME(0000)]!
sub_012_announce_08:
And the winner of this second-round battle is...
Champion [VAR TRNAME(0000)]!
sub_012_announce_09:
And the winner of this third-round battle is...
Champion [VAR TRNAME(0000)]!
sub_012_announce_05: Aaaaaand the winner of this tournament is...
sub_012_staff_04:
Congratulations on your victory! Here’s your
well-earned prize.
sub_012_staff_05: I hope to see you in the tournament again soon.
